005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IArgument;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IAnyUriItem;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IStringItem;
016
017import java.net.URI;
018import java.util.List;
019
020import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
021import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
022
023public final class FnStaticBaseUri {
024  @NonNull
025  static final IFunction SIGNATURE = IFunction.builder()
026      .name("static-base-uri")
027      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS)
028      .deterministic()
029      .contextDependent()
030      .focusIndependent()
031      .argument(IArgument.builder()
032          .name("arg1")
033          .type(IStringItem.class)
034          .zeroOrOne()
035          .build())
036      .returnType(IAnyUriItem.class)
037      .returnOne()
038      .functionHandler(FnStaticBaseUri::execute)
039      .build();
040
041  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
042  @NonNull
043  private static ISequence<IAnyUriItem> execute(@NonNull IFunction function,
044      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
045      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
046      IItem focus) {
047
048    IAnyUriItem uri = fnStaticBaseUri(dynamicContext);
049    return ISequence.of(uri);
050  }
051
052  private FnStaticBaseUri() {
053    // disable construction
054  }
055
056  /**
057   * Get the static base URI from the static context.
058   *
059   * @param context
060   *          the dynamic context
061   * @return the base URI or {@code null} if none was set
062   */
063  @Nullable
064  public static IAnyUriItem fnStaticBaseUri(@NonNull DynamicContext context) {
065    URI staticBaseUri = context.getStaticContext().getBaseUri();
066
067    return staticBaseUri == null ? null : IAnyUriItem.valueOf(staticBaseUri);
068  }
069}
